title: Ouinet URI descriptor v0
description: A URI descriptor is a set of different versions of the data and metadata behind a URI which make sense as a whole according to a particular injector service.

date.$comment: Format: '<long ISO 8601 UTC date up to seconds>'

dlinks.$comment: The pattern for property names is the same as mhash values.

^[123456789ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZabcde.description: A list of URIs for data retrieval.

ouinet_descriptor_version.description: The version of the schema that this descriptor adheres to.
ouinet_descriptor_version.$comment: The same number indicated at the schema's title.

uris.description: The URIs that this descriptor describes.

ts.description: The time when this descriptor was created.

versions.description: The different versions of the URI bound together by this descriptor.

items.description: A particular version of the URI with a fixed data length and hash, and optional metadata.

ts.description: The time when this version was last seen by the injector.

data_length.description: Length of this version's data in bytes.

data_hash.description: A self-describing, text-encoded digest of this version's data.

^meta_[_0-9a-z]+$.description: A set of arbitrary, named, string-valued properties acting as metadata (e.g. for the particular URI protocol).

data_links.description: If present, it maps data hashes to a list of URIs for data retrieval.

signatures.description: Signatures of injector services on this descriptor; public key and time stamp are used as signing entity.
signatures.$comment: Entity name format: '<sig algo>:1:<unpadded Base64 pubkey>#<long ISO 8601 UTC date up to seconds>#<other stuff>'

^[0-9a-z]+:1:[+/0-9A-Za-z]+#[0-9]{4}-[0-.description: Signatures of a particular injector service (exactly one for the given key and time).
^[0-9a-z]+:1:[+/0-9A-Za-z]+#[0-9]{4}-[0-.$comment: Signature format: '<sig algo>:1' (key, same as in name); '<unpadded Base64 signature>' (value)

unsigned.description: This part may be added by cache publishers, but it is not signed by injector services.

data_links.description: If present, it maps data hashes to a list of URIs for data retrieval.
